ingredients.item: 260g pack skinless, boneless cod fillets, cut into chunks

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the parsnip and chorizo for 2-3 minutes. Add the passata and nutmeg, and bring to the boil. Stir in the kale, cover and simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Add the cod, cover and cook for 3 minutes, or until the fish is just cooked.
